price: 10. Kaadu usun woh aalamuk: nummah nanu nek iyyaanam cakki maabbah aabbinninoy, hinnay tu raaqisa kas le mara akkinninoy, urta giráh mara akkuk manannino iyyen.
arabic: وَقَالُواْ لَوۡ كُنَّا نَسۡمَعُ أَوۡ نَعۡقِلُ مَا كُنَّا فِيٓ أَصۡحَٰبِ ٱلسَّعِيرِ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.
